subject: Re: [junit] Unsubscribing
msgSnippet: ... The list moderator (Erik Maede if I m right) can (gently) kick you out of the ML without the need of a xenophobic message :-) -Vladimir -- Vladimir
messageBody:
> Does anyone know an iron clad, guaranteed method to stop receiving mail from
> this list (other than posting a patently obnoxious, xenophobic message that
> gets me kicked off)?


The list moderator (Erik Maede if I'm right) can (gently) kick you out
of the ML without the need of a xenophobic message :-)

-Vladimir

--
